Title: Browser Compatibility - Edge
Description: Test that validates functionality works in Edge as per NFR.
Test Steps: Open application in Edge | Perform PRD upload and test case generation
Expected Results: All features function correctly

Title: Browser Compatibility - Chrome
Description: Test that validates functionality works in Chrome as per NFR.
Test Steps: Open application in Chrome | Perform PRD upload and test case generation
Expected Results: All features function correctly

Title: RAG Coverage Increase
Description: Test that validates RAG-enabled mode produces ≥20% more coverage than non-RAG as per Success Criteria.
Test Steps: Generate test cases with RAG OFF | Record coverage | Generate test cases with RAG ON | Record coverage | Compare coverage percentages
Expected Results: Coverage with RAG ON is ≥20% higher than with RAG OFF

Title: AI Test Coverage Accuracy
Description: Test that validates AI-generated test case coverage accuracy is ≥90% as per Success Criteria.
Test Steps: Generate test cases for a sample PRD | Run coverage analysis tool | Compare coverage percentage
Expected Results: Coverage percentage is ≥90%

Title: System Latency - Action Response Time
Description: Test that validates system latency is <2 seconds per action as per NFR.
Test Steps: Navigate to Generate Test Cases Screen | Click Generate Test Cases Button | Measure response time
Expected Results: Action completes within 2 seconds

Title: UI Responsiveness During Upload
Description: Test that validates UI remains responsive during PRD upload as per NFR.
Test Steps: Navigate to PRD Upload Screen | Start uploading a large DOC file | Interact with other UI elements (e.g., click Help link)
Expected Results: UI remains responsive, no freezing or blocking

Title: Filter & Search - By Status
Description: Test that validates filtering test cases by status as per FR-8.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Select Rejected from Status filter | Click Apply Filter
Expected Results: Dashboard displays only rejected test cases

Title: Filter & Search - By Test Type
Description: Test that validates filtering test cases by test type as per FR-8.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Select API from Test Type filter | Click Apply Filter
Expected Results: Dashboard displays only API test cases

Title: Filter & Search - By PRD Name
Description: Test that validates filtering test cases by PRD name as per FR-8.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Enter PRD name in PRD filter field | Click Apply Filter
Expected Results: Dashboard displays test cases associated with the specified PRD

Title: Export Approved Test Cases - CSV
Description: Test that validates exporting approved test cases to CSV as per FR-7.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Filter status to Approved | Click Export CSV Button
Expected Results: CSV file downloaded containing only approved test cases

Title: Manual Test Case Creation - Successful
Description: Test that validates manual creation of a test case with Title, Steps, and Expected Result fields as per FR-6.
Test Steps: Navigate to Manual Test Case Form | Enter Title 'Login Test' | Enter Steps 'Open login page, enter credentials, click login' | Enter Expected Result 'User is logged in' | Click Save Test Case Button
Expected Results: New test case appears in Test Management Dashboard with status Draft

Title: Test Case Review - Reject
Description: Test that validates rejecting a test case updates its status to Rejected as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Locate a generated test case | Click Reject button
Expected Results: Test case status changes to Rejected

Title: Test Case Review - Approve
Description: Test that validates approving a test case updates its status to Approved as per FR-5.
Test Steps: Navigate to Test Management Dashboard | Locate a generated test case | Click Approve button
Expected Results: Test case status changes to Approved

Title: Test Case Generation Performance
Description: Test that validates system generates 100+ test cases within 30 seconds as per NFR.
Test Steps: Navigate to Generate Test Cases Screen | Upload a valid PRD | Click Generate Test Cases Button
Expected Results: System generates >100 test cases within 30 seconds

Title: Test Type Selection - Multiple Types
Description: Test that validates selecting multiple test types results in generated test cases of those types as per FR-3.
Test Steps: Navigate to Generate Test Cases Screen | Select Functional, API, UI/UX test types | Click Generate Test Cases Button
Expected Results: Generated test cases include Functional, API, and UI/UX types

Title: RAG Disable - AI Without Contextual Knowledge
Description: Test that validates disabling RAG causes AI to generate test cases without referencing contextual knowledge as per FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Generate Test Cases Screen | Toggle RAG Switch to OFF | Click Generate Test Cases Button
Expected Results: AI generates test cases without contextual knowledge

Title: RAG Enable - AI References Contextual Knowledge
Description: Test that validates enabling RAG causes AI to reference contextual knowledge for test case generation as per FR-2.
Test Steps: Navigate to Generate Test Cases Screen | Toggle RAG Switch to ON | Click Generate Test Cases Button
Expected Results: AI references contextual knowledge, test cases generated with enhanced accuracy

Title: PRD Upload - Unsupported File Type
Description: Test that validates error when uploading unsupported file type (PDF) as per FR-1.
Test Steps: Navigate to PRD Upload Screen | Drag-and-drop a PDF file | Click Upload Button
Expected Results: Error message displayed: 'Unsupported file type', upload rejected

Title: PRD Upload - Exceeding File Size Limit
Description: Test that validates error when uploading a file larger than 10MB as per FR-1.
Test Steps: Navigate to PRD Upload Screen | Drag-and-drop a TXT file >10MB | Click Upload Button
Expected Results: Error message displayed: 'File size exceeds 10MB', upload rejected

Title: PRD Upload - Successful DOC Upload
Description: Test that validates successful upload of a DOC file within size limit as per FR-1.
Test Steps: Navigate to PRD Upload Screen | Drag-and-drop a DOC file (size <10MB) | Click Upload Button
Expected Results: File uploads successfully, success message displayed, file stored securely, system accepts the file
